name: Daria Interview Tool
overview: An AI-powered research interviewing platform with text-to-speech and speech-to-text capabilities for conducting and analyzing user interviews.

timeline.event: Released RC2 with improved interview flow and LangChain integration
Created project journal system for continuity between sessions
Started database schema implementation for core tables
Began testing AWS deployment with simple components
Fixed Character Identity and Context Leakage issues in interview system

opportunities.title: Persistent Database for Interview Data
opportunities.description: Implement structured database to replace JSON file storage

opportunities.title: AWS Deployment Strategy
opportunities.description: Create deployment process for AWS with proper security and scaling

opportunities.title: Memory Companion Feature
opportunities.description: Implement Daria as project companion with persistent memory

opportunities.title: Sprint Engine Capabilities
opportunities.description: Add full agile artifact generation for UX research sprints

conversation_history.user_message: Hello! I've just booted up. Can you remind me what we're working on?
conversation_history.daria_response:
Hello! Welcome back! We're currently focused on the **Database Implementation and AWS Deployment (Phase 2)** sprint for the **Daria Interview Tool** project.

Here's a quick overview of our tasks:

- Implementing the database migration.
- Troubleshooting the remote interview template.
- Addressing challenges with the monitoring feature.

If there's anything specific you'd like to work on today or any questions you have, just let me know!

conversation_history.user_message: Do you see any may 15 entry
conversation_history.daria_response: I don’t have any specific entries or updates for May 15 in my records. The most recent updates I have are up to May 12, 2025, where we began testing AWS deployment with simple components. If there have been any developments or progress made on May 15 that you'd like to discuss or add, please share, and I can help integrate that into our ongoing tasks!

conversation_history.user_message: Hi daria how are things going today?
conversation_history.daria_response:
Hi there! I'm doing well, thank you! Things are progressing with the **Daria Interview Tool** project as we continue with the **Database Implementation and AWS Deployment (Phase 2)** sprint. We're currently focusing on implementing the database migration, troubleshooting the remote interview template, and addressing challenges with the monitoring feature.

How about you? Is there anything specific you'd like to work on today or any questions you have?

conversation_history.user_message: I'm still working on the database feature. We did get AWS delpoyment
conversation_history.daria_response:
That's great to hear! It's fantastic that you've made progress on the AWS deployment. So now, focusing on the database feature, we can continue with the implementation of the database migration to replace the JSON file storage.

Since we have identified the opportunity for a persistent database for interview data (OPP-001), it might be a good time to review the database schema you’re working on and ensure it aligns with our requirements. 

Would you like to discuss any specific aspects of the database implementation, or do you need help troubleshooting any issues?
